doc.field: ATT AMERICAUS TRUST 2 ATU> CLOSES EARLY

Americus Trust for American Telephone and Telegraph Co Shares, Series 2, said it has reached its limit of 10 mln ATT T> shares and has closed. The trust was scheduled to close April One. Common stock tendered into an Americus trust is converted into trust units on a one share for one unit basis. Each unit may be divided into separately-traded PRIME and SCORE components. Reuter
